HomePage.title: Trade on Prediction Market with AI like a Top Trader
HomePage.subtitle: Stop guessing on prediction markets. Follow proven traders with verified win rates and automatically copy their trades to your wallet.
HomePage.connectWalletTitle: Connect Your Wallet to View Top Traders
HomePage.connectWalletText: Access the complete leaderboard of top performers on Polymarket. View their trading history, profit metrics, and start copy trading with a single click.
HomePage.leaderboardSubtitle: Ranked by scientific metrics: risk-adjusted returns, profit factor, and consistency.
HomePage.howToPickTitle: How to Pick the Best Traders to Copy
HomePage.howToPickSubtitle: Not all traders are equal. Follow these tips to maximize your copy trading success.

diversify.title: Diversify Across Traders
diversify.desc: Copy 3-5 traders with different styles to reduce risk and smooth out returns. Don't put all eggs in one basket.

performance.title: Check Recent Performance
performance.desc: Focus on 7-day and 30-day stats, not just all-time. Markets change and so do trader strategies.

startSmall.title: Start Small
startSmall.desc: Begin with smaller allocations and increase as you verify the trader's performance and consistency.

monitor.title: Monitor Weekly
monitor.desc: Check your portfolio every week and adjust based on trader performance. Stop copying underperformers early.

faq.q1: How do I know which Polymarket traders to follow?
faq.a1: Look for traders with consistent win rates (above 55%), positive profit over 7-30 days, and multiple followers. Avoid traders who only trade occasionally or have recent losing streaks.
faq.q2: Can I copy multiple traders at once?
faq.a2: Yes! With Horus, you can copy unlimited traders simultaneously. This is actually recommended for diversification â€” if one trader has a bad week, others may balance it out.
faq.q3: How much should I allocate per trader?
faq.a3: We recommend starting with $50-100 per trader and spreading across 3-5 traders. As you learn which traders perform best for your risk tolerance, you can adjust allocations.
faq.q4: What if a top trader starts losing money?
faq.a4: You can pause or stop copying any trader instantly. We recommend checking your portfolio weekly and adjusting if a trader has lost more than 20% in a month.
faq.a5: All trader statistics on Horus come directly from on-chain Polymarket data. Win rates, PnL, and trading history are verifiable and cannot be faked.

HomePage.footerText: Join thousands of traders already copying Polymarket whales. It's free to start â€” you only pay when you profit.

zeroLine.title: Zero Line (Direct Bonus)
zeroLine.subtitle: Earn from your team's trades up to 5 generations deep
zeroLine.explanation: When anyone in your team executes a trade, a 0.1% platform fee is collected. You earn a percentage of this fee based on their generation:

sunLine.title: Sun Line (Team Differential)
sunLine.subtitle: Earn extra from the tier difference between you and your downline
sunLine.explanation: When a lower-tier member in your network trades, you earn the difference between your tier rate and their tier rate. This rewards building a deep team!
sunLine.formula: Sun Line = Fee Ã— (Your Rate - Their Rate)

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about the affiliate program
faq.q1: How do I upgrade my tier?
faq.a1: Your tier upgrades automatically when you meet the requirements. You need a certain number of direct referrals AND total team members. For example, to reach VIP you need 3 direct referrals and 10 total team members.
faq.q2: When do I receive my commissions?
faq.a2: Commissions are credited instantly when your team members execute trades. They are added to your "Pending Payout" balance and can be withdrawn at any time.
faq.q3: What is a "Sun Line" / Strong Leg?
faq.a3: A Sun Line (Strong Leg) is a direct referral who has built their own active team. Having multiple Sun Lines indicates a healthy, distributed network and is key to maximizing Team Differential earnings.
faq.q4: How do I withdraw my earnings?
faq.a4: Go to your Affiliate Dashboard, click the "Withdraw" button next to Total Earnings, sign the transaction with your wallet, and your USDC will be sent to your wallet address.
faq.q5: What is the difference between Zero Line and Sun Line?
faq.a5: Zero Line is your direct commission from team trades (25% Gen1, 10% Gen2, etc.). Sun Line (Team Differential) is the bonus you earn from the difference between your tier rate and lower-tier members in your downline.
